Understanding the ContextThis is a Results question, not an Execute Next Steps question. Asking this now will likely sendRachel in a different direction and risk making any progress with this conversation.

The best question to ask at this point is, "As the representative of one of the products regularly prescribed in this office, what can I do to help get your staff up-to-speed on the coverage information for my product?"

This Execute Next Steps question moves you toward taking action and helps you to better understand how to position yourself as an advisor and trusted resource to decision makers.

Here is how Rachel would have answered that question:

"When you visit our practice, it would be good if you could meet with the nurses and staff members who are handling the insurance tracking. That way, you’ll be able to learn first-hand what obstacles they’re encountering when prescribing your product, and hopefully you’ll have solutions or suggestions to help them. Also, occasional reminders to keep the entire office staff informed about your product would be helpful."
